project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide additional physical capacity at the Port of Lagos and assist NPA in improving its management and operations. The project would comprise: (a) construction of a new 1,000 m berthage (5 berths); (b) construction of transit sheds, a warehouse, service building, road accesses, rail tracks and utilities; (c) purchase of cargo handling equipment; (d) dredging of a channel, and a turning basin in the harbor; (e) consulting services for civil works construction and supervision; and (f) expert services for management improvement.
